name: three-meet
description: A low-fantasy roleplaying game based on 5E
author: R.G. Wood <ric@grislyeye.com> (https://grislyeye.com)

scripts.build: rsync -av --progress --exclude dist/ --exclude nodemodules/ --exclude .git/ ./ dist/ && npm instal --production
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean && npm run build
